transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Okay, recording, and... now!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Butthead voice) Space Ghost isn't home right now, (laughs). (changes to Beavis voice) (laughs) Is there something I can help you with? (laughs some more) (normal voice) Okay, there you go.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's not for Space Ghost, it's for me.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Did you want, I thought you...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, I want one for me.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Beavis voice) Voltar isn't home right now. Leave a message. Beep!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Okay.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: My name's Moltar.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (winces) Moltar.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, and, and say some stuff about fire this time.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Beavis voice) Moltar isn't home right now, fire, fire, leave a message.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Wait, wait, I, I wanted one with Butthead.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Another one?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, do one for me!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Okay, who's it for?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (pokes his head into control room) Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Do him and me!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Me and him.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: And make it funny this time.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Beavis voice) Zorak isn't here, Moltar isn't here, leave a message. (does the finger & lips thing)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, make it funny!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Hank Hill voice) Zo-, Zorak and Noltar...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Moltar.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (disgusted) Ah! Forget it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, no, no, no, no!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Get what's-his-name to do a message for ya. (starts to walk off)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Sit down, you gore belly rump dead foot licker! We're not done yet!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in) Greetings, all. Space Ghost is my name, and animated comedy-style interview programs based in outer space are my game. Joining me tonight are craven fat kidneyed flirt gill Harland Williams, and unmuscled sheep biting mold warp Mike Judge.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Have you seen my tail?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Your what?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: My tail. Some joker cut it off!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You don't have a tail!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I know, because some joker cut it off!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Calm down, Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You calm down! Did you eat it?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why would I eat your stupid tail, I didn't even know ya had one!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I didn't eat it. I don't even like tail.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, wait, here it is. (pause) It's not a tail after all...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Play me to the desk.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It's a wacky fun slippery slide!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Whoa, whoa!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Wooo hoo hoo!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hey, check this out! (slides by)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: All right, put the wacky fun slippery slide away.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Whee-eeeeee! (slides by)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (crash!) My knee!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Please welcome my first guest, citizen Harland Williams

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: (monitor lowers from ceiling) (yodels)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Greetings, Harland!

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Hello there... Billy.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My name is not...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Wheeeeeeeee! (slides by)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: ... Billy.

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Oh. (winks)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: 'kay, Billy. Gotcha. (winks again)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, hey, don't call me Billy.I do not care for the name Billy.

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, you... you're a little, uh, rambunctious today.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How would you like it if I pulled down your pants and spanked your bare bottom right here in front of Zorak, Moltar and everybody!

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: I'll say one word about y- that: naughty.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Naughty?

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Naughty. (points) Naughty Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What do you mean?

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: There's naughty stuff goin' on in your head, you probably have, like, daydreams about pomegranates, and ...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (hears "pomegranates" with echo effect)

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Sea fleece.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (hears "sea fleece" with same echo effect)

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Timber.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (hears "chocolate chip cookie dough" with same echo effect)

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: You like wood, don't you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, sure I do. Who doesn't like wood? Cedar, mahogany, rustic pine. Yes, wood is good food. (smile sparkles)

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Naughty-y-y-y-y-y-y-y-y-y-y-y-y-y-y-y (image & sound get stuck in a loop; continues in the background)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) (pause) What's the matter?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: That's some wacky stuff.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Alright. Uhhhh... hang on. (Harland keeps looping) Uh, is this on the same tape, or...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Stop! (blasts Harland with his destructo ray)

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: (stops looping) God bless you, O black capped whitey legs. D'you have varicose veins?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, I don't.

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Y'got big puffy veins, (makes pulsing sounds and motions with his hands) pulsing away like organ grinder monkeys on cheese twists.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, he's got legs like his greasy grannie! (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That extra grease tacked two years onto her life, thank you very much.

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: You ever, uh, rubbed a bar of soap on your grandmother's forehead?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I... don't think I'll have occasion to, being that she's no longer with us.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Why, what would happen?

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Well, you'd have yourself one heck of a sparkling clean grand-mamá.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Maybe you didn't hear me. My grandmother bought a farm!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Really?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Cattle or crops?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: She's dead, all right?! I don't want to talk about it!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oops. Back to the veins.

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Tell me about your veins. See, I'm turnin' the questioning around, now tell us about your big, greasy space veins... white legs!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Harland Williams, I will not hold court to your mischief!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! The completion backward principle!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, completion backwards principle?

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Tell us about the veins! (slurps)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Remember? Zorak creates a diversion, while you circumnavigate Ghost Planet at the speed of light...

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: That's right, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Causing the planet to reverse its rotation.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Which in turn opens a multidimensional chasm. (monitor shows Space Ghost with three screens completely full of text flashing over him, reading, in part:)

transcript.speaker: Keith Crofford-Tad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: TempCrofford-Tad Ghostal:Temporary Items:WCrofford-Tad Ghostal:Temporary Items:WCrofford-Tad Ghostal:Temporary Items:W

transcript.speaker: Crofford-Tad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Temporary Items:WCrofford-Tad Ghostal:Temporary Items:WCHANGE OR DELETE THE FOLLOWI>OTHER REASONS FOR HIS ABSENC>(available in stores September 2 - EX

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thusly causing time to go backwards so that I can redo and/or cancel the interview before the secret of my hideous and spidery varicose veins becomes common knowledge to the general public!

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: You see now, Space Ghost?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes! Why didn't I think of it before?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You did! You called it the completion backwards principle!

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: All hail Space Ghost! And his giant pulsing veiny legs!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak! Create a diversion!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, everybody! Look at me! Do doodley do do, do do da do do...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (flies off)

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Wh-, where is he?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Ever see Superman 1?

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: Yes.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: He'll be back in a sec.

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (flies back to desk)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: He's back!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (out of breath) Greetings! (pants) I (pants) am (pants) Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: What, you wake up with a Winnie the Pooh video in your shorts?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Idiot! You went the wrong direction! (screen shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Are you sure?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: We've been on for three hours now!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah! I want time and a half!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ohhhhh... (falls down onto floor, everybody laughs) I think I pulled too many G's.

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: That a boy, Jerry.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Jerry! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Harland Williams
transcript.dialogue: (waves)

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (on Moltar's monitor, in Hank Hill voice) Oh, I tell ya what, that Space Ghost has a nice little patootie on him, don't he? (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No!! (throws lever, sends Mike to studio monitor) You make me sick!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Butthead voice) That was cool! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Identify yourself to the universe.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: I am Mike Judge. I am the creator of B-

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I know, I know, I know, I know, I know. I know what you do.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Oh. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Maybe I can help you with your little cartoon deal.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Uh, yeah, I, I would like to know what I can do to make what I do funnier.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You should make your show like "Die Hard". Only put it on a bus! And then you should make the guys talk funny and hit each other in the head. And have explosions!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: I, I'm gonna write that down.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And you should give all the guys in the thing a destructo ray and a freeze ray. And you should make them talk funny and hit each other.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in background) In the head.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah! In the head!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, yeah, destructo ray, freeze ray, that could probably, like, that could put us over the top.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Then I would come in and save the day! (hums superhero-type theme music)

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Well, um, you know how to get a hold of me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, wait, I just remembered! Draw everyone with large muscular lantern-like jaws. Like mine! (jaw sparkles)

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Think if I'd drawn Butthead and Beavis with stronger jaws, and, uh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: White booties!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, white boots, they, they might be funnier and they might score.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, you know what they say, Mike, dames are like mustard. They taste great on a sandwich. But when you're not eating a sandwich, they just sit there in your refrigerator... on a shelf... in a jar... labeled... mustard.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Oh yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay then. Citizen Mike, give me an infectious laugh that millions will aspire to imitate.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Well, you know, I actually found a tape of myself trying out different laughs. There was like (does Butthead laugh) and there was like (does monkey-like laugh) and, uh, you know, then, of course (does Beavis laugh). And, uh, if you wanted to have the (does monkey-like laugh) you could probably have that one.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (Does monkey-like laugh) Will this (does monkey-like laugh) give me the approval of the much sought after 18 to 34 year old demographic?

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: No, not really. (laughs) But it's free, though.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Then I'll take it! Citizen Mike, what are your favorite programs?

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: I really like this, I like Space Ghost, man.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thank you!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: I like, uh, Space Ghost... And, uh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost?

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Uh, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thank you once again! How can I repay you for your undying devotion?

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: You could go into the cartoon "Rug Rats", and just sorta clean house.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yyyou want me to whack the Rug Rats?

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: I'll give you a list of some people in the industry that need to be, uh, that need to have this done to 'em.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Aaaaaa!!!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Sorry.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Don't be.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That was quite a display of superior firepower.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Can you put a sound effect into this... (blasts Zorak again)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Noooo!!!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: ... to make us equal?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sure thing...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Wait a minute...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever)

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in superhero/Hank Hill voice) What special powers do you have to help fight the insanity? (blasts Zorak again)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: No, wait... Aaaaaaa!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, listen: What special powers do you have to help stop the insanity? (blasts Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Nooooooo!!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: You're right, let me try that again.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hold it, gimme just a sec.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (Blasts Zorak again) What special powers do you have to help stop the insanity?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: All right, stop it!!! It hurts, okay?!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hmmm, I dunno.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Well, let's hear you do Butthead.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (completely straight voice) Ha ha ha, ha, ha ha. My name is Butthead, my head is a giant human butt. Ha, ha ha.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: And how about Beavis?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (also in straight voice) Shut up, Butt land, my name is Beavis. How was that?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in background) Fab-oh!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Yyyeah, yeah, that was... well, that was great.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I'm good, baby.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: I'd like to hear Zorak do Beavis.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'd like to hear Mike Judge shut up!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (looks shocked)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ooooh, did you hear that, Mike.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Well, tell him I'd like to tie the long hair on his head to the short hair on his nose and kick him down the street, okay?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Bring it on, you son of a carpenter.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Knock it off, guys. Come on.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (In Skeletor, from He-Man, voice) The power scepter is mine now, Beast Man!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: That's my tail!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: You betcha.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Gimme back my tail!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Wheeeeee! (slides by)

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Beavis' Cornholio voice) Are you threatening me?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You've got my tail!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: All right, everybody. Just stop!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (stares back)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stares back)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (slides by) Wo wo wo wo...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thanks for stopping by, Mike.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Hank Hill voice) Boy, I tell ya what, it don't get any better'n this.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Nope! It sure doesn't.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Beavis voice) (laughs) Boy! (laughs) It doesn't get any better than this! (laughs) Yeah!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You hit the nose on the head, compadre! It just doesn't get any better than this!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Butthead voice) Uh, it doesn't get any better than this? (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, it doesn't. And there you have it, folks.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Buzzcut voice) Boy, it doesn't get any better than this!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Mike...

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Mr. Van Driesen voice) You know, it really doesn't get any better than this, mm-kay?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Mmm-kay! Thanks for being on the...

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Principal McVickers voice) (wheezes) It doesn't get any better than this. (wheezes)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Mike... Mike!!

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: (in Butthead voice) Uh... (in normal voice) What's that?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I have to go home now.

transcript.speaker: Mike Judge
transcript.dialogue: Here's Tom Anderson: "Boy, I tell ya what." Here's Hank Hill: "Boy, I tell ya what." It's a big difference.
